name: eSports Manager
description:
Manage players, negotiate with sponsors and create merchandise to strengthen your organisation, then head into battle against 23 other professional eSports teams.

In the real-time simulation of battle YOU will call the timeouts, load-outs and tactics. Your choices will shape your team’s future. Can you win the ‘ESMA Championship’?

If you enjoy the thrill of CS:GO style FPS download games, and you have a passion for e-sport, then this super charged eSports management simulation is just for you!

If you like playing:

• management games
• simulation games
• Counter-Strike: GO (CSGO)

then Download eSports Manager today!

Minimum Requirements:
At least 1024MB RAM
Android Minimum: 4.1+, Recommended 5.0+

Tested on Nexus 4, OnePlus 2, OnePlus X, Samsung Galaxy S3. If you experience technical issues please email greg@testudogames.com

English language used within the game!
